hero.description: The first professional gymnastics league. Mixed teams. Normalized scoring. $100K in Year 1 prizes. 4 events. 4 champions.

forAthletes.label: For Athletes
forAthletes.heading: COMPETE LIKE A PRO

cashPrizes.title: Real Cash Prizes
cashPrizes.description: $25K per event. $100K total in Year 1. 1st place takes $15K, 2nd $7.5K, 3rd $2.5K.

mixedTeams.title: Mixed Teams
mixedTeams.description: Build your own team of 3+ gymnasts. All women, all men, or any mix—your choice.

figLevel.title: FIG-Level Competition
figLevel.description: Same routines. Same judging. Same rules. Just normalized scores for fair cross-apparatus comparison.

fourEvents.title: 4 Events Per Year
fourEvents.description: Each event is one day: Qualification → Semi-Final → Final. Multiple chances to compete and win.

forAthletes.callout: Open invitational: Any gymnast 16+ who can perform FIG-level routines is welcome. No federation restrictions. No qualification hoops. Just bring your team and compete.

forSpectators.label: For Spectators
forSpectators.heading: GYMNASTICS LIKE YOU'VE NEVER SEEN
forSpectators.paragraph1: Forget 3-day competitions with confusing rotation schedules. Battle Royale is a single-day spectacle designed for maximum entertainment.
forSpectators.paragraph2: Watch 64 teams battle through qualification rounds in the morning. Return for the high-stakes semi-finals and finals in the evening. Every routine matters. Every score counts.
forSpectators.paragraph3: With normalized scoring out of 10, you'll instantly understand who's winning—no gymnastics degree required.

morningQualifications.title: MORNING QUALIFICATIONS
morningQualifications.description: 9:00 AM – 3:00 PM. Four rounds. 64 teams compete.

eveningFinals.title: EVENING FINALS
eveningFinals.description: 6:00 PM – 8:30 PM. Semi-finals and finals. Top 12 → Top 4 → Champion.

forSponsors.label: For Sponsors
forSponsors.heading: PARTNER WITH THE FUTURE
forSponsors.description: Gymnastics reached 41.5 million viewers at Paris 2024—the most-watched Olympic sport. Yet there's no professional league to capture this audience year-round. Until now.

rulesSummary.label: The Format
rulesSummary.heading: SIMPLE. FAIR. EXCITING.
rulesSummary.paragraph1: Traditional gymnastics scoring is confusing. Different apparatus, different max scores, impossible to compare. We fixed that.
rulesSummary.paragraph2: Score Normalization: Every routine is judged using standard FIG rules, then normalized to a maximum of 10. This means you can directly compare a beam routine to a high bar routine—apples to apples.
rulesSummary.paragraph3: This breakthrough allows mixed WAG/MAG teams and makes every score instantly understandable to casual viewers.

emailSignup.label: Stay Connected
emailSignup.heading: JOIN THE WAITLIST
emailSignup.description: Be the first to know when registration opens. Get early access to dates, venues, tickets, and exclusive updates.
emailSignup.footer: We respect your inbox. No spam, just important Battle Royale updates.
